WE'VE GOT AN ENTIRE BOWL OF

>> Announcer: TONIGHT, STEPHEN
WELCOMES ELLIE KEMPER!

AND A BEAUTIFUL PERFORMANCE BY
WE ARE SCIENTISTS!

AND NOW IT'S TIME FOR "THE LATE
SHOW" WITH STEPHEN COLBERT!

(CHEERS AND APPLAUSE)
WELCOME TO "THE LATE SHOW,"

WHAT A LOVELY CROWD THIS
EVENING.

I'M YOUR HOST STEPHEN COLBERT
FOR "THE LATE SHOW" TONIGHT.

QUICK QUESTION BEFORE WE GET ON
WITH THE REST OF THE SHOW, IS

(CHEERS AND APPLAUSE)
WELL, THERE'S BIG NEWS FROM

FACEBOOK TODAY BECAUSE THEY'RE
CHANGING THE ALGORITHM BEHIND

YOUR NEWS FEED, AND IT'S GOING
TO "LIMIT THE AMOUNT OF CONTENT

FROM... BRANDS, CELEBRITIES AND
MEDIA" IN FAVOR OF "MORE POSTS

AND I THINK I SPEAK FOR EVERYONE
ON FACEBOOK WHEN I SAY: "WELL,

THE COMPANY SAYS THE TWEAK IS
GOING TO BE GOOD NEWS FOR USERS
WHO WANT MORE CUTE BABY PHOTOS.

THERE COULD BE MORE BABY PHOTOS
ON FACEBOOK?

I KNOW THEY'RE YOUR BUNDLES OF
JOY, BUT UNTIL THEY'RE A YEAR

OLD THEY JUST LOOK LIKE LITTLE
DWIGHT EISENHOWERS!

(LAUGHTER)
LITTLE TINY -- EACH ONE OF THEM

THEY'RE THE ONLY ONE OF MY
FACEBOOK FRIENDS I ACTUALLY

BEEN TO BED WITH THEM A FEW
TIMES, TOO.

OF COURSE, SOMEONE IS CHEERING
THE IDEA OF ME HAVING SEX WITH A
EVERY DAY I CHECK THE NEWS.

BUT EVERY DAY, OUR TWO
PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES ARE

STILL HILLARY CLINTON AND DONALD
TRUMP.

A LOT OF PEOPLE ARE FINDING IT
HARD TO GET EXCITED FOR THESE

TWO CANDIDATES, AND NOTHING
PROVES THAT MORE THAN THIS

ACTUAL NEW POLL FROM PUBLIC
POLICY POLLING.

HILLARY CLINTON GOT 43%, DONALD
TRUMP GOT 38%, AND, THIS WAS AN

ACTUAL CHOICE, A GIANT METEOR
HITTING THE EARTH GOT 13%.

38% FOR TRUMP, 13% FOR A METEOR,
THAT ADDS UP TO 51% OF THE

PEOPLE ARE OKAY WITH THE WORLD
COMING TO AN END.

(CHEERS AND APPLAUSE)
TWO GIANT DESTRUCTIVE ORANGE

EARTH POLLED PARTICULARLY WELL
AMONG INDEPENDENT VOTERS, AND

NOW TRUMP MIGHT BE GETTING A
BOOST IN THE POLLS BECAUSE

SOURCES SAY TRUMP IS VETTING
CHRIS CHRISTIE AS A POTENTIAL

TRUMP WIN VOTERS IN NEW JERSEY,
WHO ARE ANXIOUS TO GET RID OF

THE SOURCE CLAIMS CHRISTIE HAS
BEGUN THE OFFICIAL VETTING

PROCESS, WHICH I BELIEVE MEANS
TRYING TO SELL MORE LEMONADE IN

CURRENT PRESIDENT OBAMA WAS IN
CANADA.

LIKE MANY AMERICANS, I ASSUME HE
--

(APPLAUSE)
-- I ASSUME HE WAS APPLYING FOR

(LAUGHTER)
BUT HE WAS ALSO THERE FOR THE

NORTH AMERICAN LEADERS' SUMMIT
WITH MEXICAN PRESIDENT ENRIQUE

PENA NIETO AND CANADIAN PRIME
MINISTER AND DISNEY PRINCESS

THIS WAS OBAMA'S LAST TIME AT
THE SUMMIT, AND THE CANADIAN

BUT THE BIG MOMENT EVERYONE'S

TRUDEAU HAS OBAMA'S HAND, GOES
FOR NIETO'S AND--

THERE'S ALWAYS ONE GUY WHO
DOESN'T KNOW WHERE TO PUT HIS
HAD THE SAME PROBLEM AT YALTA.

SAY HI TO JON BATISTE AND STAY
HUMAN!
I WANT TO GET A TAN.
I'M GOING TO DRINK IT ALL IN.

THIS IS GOING TO BE THE SUMMER I
ACTUALLY ENJOY.

IF YOU ARE THINKING ABOUT GOING
ON VACATION THIS SUMMER, YOU MAY

WANT TO THINK ABOUT GOING TO
CHINA BECAUSE THEY'VE GOT

NOW THAT DISNEYLAND IS IN CHINA,
CHILDREN THERE WILL HAVE CONTEXT

FOR THE TOYS THEY'VE BEEN
MAKING.

THE PARK IS ALREADY A HUGE
SUCCESS, BUT, APPARENTLY, A LOT

OF NAMES OF DISNEY PROPERTIES
DON'T TRANSLATE WELL INTO

CHINESE, SO THEY HAD TO MAKE
SOME CHANGES, LIKE RENAMING

DESTINY OF SNOW," AND THE
"BIBBITI BOBBITI BOUTIQUE" WAS

AND MICKEY MOUSE IS NOW CHAIRMAN
MOUSE.

AND IT'S NOT JUST CHINA THAT
-- MM-HMM.

AND IT'S NOT JUST CHINA THAT
RENAMES THINGS TO SOMETHING MORE

BECAUSE THE "LATE SHOW" IS
BROADCAST EVERYWHERE FROM

BOY, WE REALLY NEED TO UPDATE
THE MAPS IN THE WRITER'S ROOM.

SO I'M GOING TO TAKE YOU ON A
TRIP AROUND THE GLOBE, AND SHARE

SOME OF THE CHANGES WE HAVE TO
MAKE FOR INTERNATIONAL

FIRST UP, WE AIR IN ENGLAND,
WHICH MEANS IF WE DO ANY PRODUCT

PLACEMENT OF THE CANDY REESE'S
PIECES, WE HAVE TO USE ITS

A STOUT FIST OF RUNSON'S WILL
REALLY CHUFF YOUR GOB.

CAMEROON, WHERE WE HAVE TO
CHANGE OUR NAME, "THE LATE SHOW

WITH STEPHEN COLBERT" TO
TWILIGHT SHENANIGANS WITH

CAUCASIAN SUIT BUFFOON... "THE
ONE WITH GLASSES."
IT'S HARD TO TELL US APART.
I'M THE ONE WITH THE GLASSES.

WE TALK A LOT ABOUT POLITICS ON
THIS SHOW, BUT FOREIGNERS OFTEN

HAVE DIFFERENT WAYS OF
REFERRING TO OUR CANDIDATES.

FOR EXAMPLE, WHEN TALKING ABOUT
THE DEMOCRATS, TO PEOPLE IN

GHANA, I'M COVERING THE RACE
BETWEEN -- WHAT COULD POSSIBLY

GO WRONG WITH A STACK OF CARDS
THIS HIGH?!

THANK YOU FOR BEING HERE FOR OUR
LAST SHOW.

WE TALK A LOT ABOUT POLITICS ON
THIS SHOW.

WHEN TALKING ABOUT THE
DEMOCRATS, TO PEOPLE IN GHANA,

I'M COVERING THE RACE BETWEEN
TENSE-MERRIMENT CORPORATION

(CHEERS AND APPLAUSE)
THERE YOU GO RIGHT THERE!
YOU CAN HAVE THAT RIGHT THERE!

AND IN THAILAND REPUBLICAN
FRONTRUNNER DONALD TRUMP IS

MORE COMMONLY KNOWN AS
"IMPOSSIBLE PROMISE TUXEDO

WHENEVER THE SHOW IS BROADCAST

CHUCK E. CHEESE'S, WE HAVE TO

CHANGE IT TO "COMMANDANT
VERMIN'S MUSICAL PIZZA HELL."

EVEN IN CANADA THERE ARE
CHANGES.

FOR EXAMPLE, I HAVE TO CHANGE

I COULD GO FOR A GRINGO MEAT

WELL, THAT'S ALL THE TIME WE

OR AS IT'S KNOWN IN ECUADOR:

WHAT PEOPLE MAY NOT BE ABLE TO

I'M A LITTLE DISAPPOINTED

WITH.

IF YOU KNEW YOU HAD TO EAT THIS

IF YOU DROP OUT, I WILL.

MY WEDDING ANNIVERSARY IS COMING

IT'S VERY MEANINGFUL TO ME FOR

WATCHING AND FOUND OUT THAT'S

SO YOU MAYBE DIDN'T DO PRECANA.

WHAT IT'S LIKE TO BE MARRIED.

MICHAEL AND I HAD BEEN TALKING

WISE, GROUNDED CATHOLIC PRIEST,

THERE WAS ONE QUESTION, HE WAS

OTHER ALL THE DAYS OF YOUR LIFE?

YOU COME HERE FREELY TO JOIN

THE LAW OF THE CATHOLIC CHURCH,

WARD AND THOSE ARE AWKWARD
